org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.directory

Class RetryingDirContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.RetryingContext
      • org.apache.james.util.retry.naming.directory.RetryingDirContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, DirContext, ExceptionRetryingProxy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RetryingLdapContext

    public abstract class RetryingDirContext
extends RetryingContext
implements DirContext
    RetryingDirContext retries the methods defined by javax.naming.directory.DirContext according to the specified schedule.
    See Also:
    ExceptionRetryHandler, ExceptionRetryingProxy, DirContext
